vecHighlight.strDescription: Collect 100 Car Drops in The Eliminator.
Get 3 stars on every PR Stunt.
Reach level 10 in The Drift Run.
Complete all activities in a single Festival Playlist Series.
Earn all 8 Season Completion Bonuses in the same Series.
Complete all Seasonal Championships in a Festival Playlist Series.
Win all Seasonal Championships in one Spring season.
Complete all Seasonal PR Stunts in a Festival Playlist Series.
Take photos of 200 different cars for Horizon Promo.
Win all Seasonal Championships in one Winter season.
Win all Seasonal Championships in one Autumn season.
Eliminate a car at least 5 levels lower than you in a Head-to-Head race.

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Arrive at your Master Builder's LEGO® Baseplate.
Set up the Horizon Festival on Fortune Island.
Start building your Master Builder's House.
Reach Round Two of the Island Conqueror.
Win the LEGO Bugatti Chiron Speed Champions Event
Earn at least 1 star at a Trailblazer Gate.
Complete the first chapter of "British Racing Green".
Complete the first chapter of the "Upgrade Heroes" story.
Complete a Challenge Card in any Hot Wheels Car
Win the LEGO® Speed Champions F40 event.
Complete the first chapter of "Skill Streak".

data.strFullDescription:
Dynamic seasons change everything at the world’s greatest automotive festival. Go it alone or team up with others to explore beautiful and historic Britain in a shared open world. Collect, modify and drive over 450 cars. Race, stunt, create and explore – choose your own path to become a Horizon Superstar.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1293830/extras/ForzaHorizon4_AboutSectionGIF_1_600x100.gif?t=1702576030[/img]
[b]Collect Over 450 Cars[/b]
Enjoy the largest and most diverse Horizon car roster yet, including over 100 licensed manufacturers.
[h2][/h2]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1293830/extras/ForzaHorizon4_AboutSectionGIF_2_600x100.gif?t=1702576030[/img]
[b]Race. Stunt. Create. Explore.[/b]
In the new open-ended campaign, everything you do progresses your game.
[h2][/h2]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1293830/extras/ForzaHorizon4_AboutSectionGIF_3_600x100.gif?t=1702576030[/img]
[b]Explore a Shared World[/b]
Real players populate your world. When time of day, weather and seasons change, everyone playing the game experiences it at the same time.
[h2][/h2]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1293830/extras/ForzaHorizon4_AboutSectionGIF_4_600x100.gif?t=1702576030[/img]
[b]Explore Beautiful, Historic Britain[/b]
This is Britain Like You’ve Never Seen it. Discover lakes, valleys, castles, and breathtaking scenery all in spectacular native 4K and HDR.
data.strSnippet: Dynamic seasons change everything at the world’s greatest automotive festival. Go it alone or team up with others to explore beautiful and historic Britain in a shared open world.
